classification.task_goal: Write an analytical essay on marketing semiotics and its role in brand communications, including specific case studies and references.
primary_constraints: Include case studies: BT Sport: Unseen Stats, 2022 and Spotify: There’s a playlist for every emoji, 2022.
Employ marketing semiotics in the analysis.
Include articles: Marketing semiotics: signs, strategies, and brand value by Laura R. Oswald and The rise of brands by Liz Moore.
Include at least 10 references in total and cite them in the essay.
Format the essay in Harvard referencing style.
Write the essay without bullet points and do not name the paragraphs.
classification.reasoning: The AI initially failed to include all specified case studies and references in the essay, but the user later reiterated the requirements, prompting the AI to correct the oversight in subsequent responses.
